Constructor Detail

PrologContextTrackerEvent

public PrologContextTrackerEvent(java.lang.Object source,
                                 PrologInterface pif)
creates a new PrologContextTrackerEvent.

Parameters:
source - this should be the tracker that caused the event.
pif - this should be what the pif thinks is the currently active PrologInterface _AFTER_ the change. Maybe null to indicate that no pif is currently active according to the source tracker.
Method Detail

getPrologInterface

public PrologInterface getPrologInterface()
Returns:
the currently active PrologInterface (according to the tracker that send this event), or null if no PrologInterface is active (dito).
